item.description:
HAL KATZMAN and THE KADIMA BAND
OUTDOOR GAZEBO CONCERTS
SUMMER 2008

A message from Hal: "I would love to have you come to any or all of these concerts as these are great chances to hear me in my element as Lead Vocalist! We play a wide range of music, from our specialty, Hebrew and Israeli music, all the way to classic Sinatra, Broadway and great rock and roll. In short, we'll have lots of fun!"

Please come out and support Hal in his only public performances of the year. See you there!


Sharon, July 30 7:00-8:30 pm
MEMORIAL PARK BEACH
Beach Street (off Pond Street)

Directions: RT 95S ( off 128 ) Take exit 10 amd follow to center of town. You will be on RT 27. There are several bends in the road. At Sharon center go straight thru the light and take a right onto Pond St. At about one mile you will pass Sharon HS. Take the next right onto Beach St. and the entrance into the Beach/Concert area is on the left. Drive in and you will be able to park in the field on the right.

Resident beach. Lifeguards on duty (seasonal). Bathhouse, docks, swim lessons, bandstand, picnic table, parking. Waterfront wheelchair. Restrooms, concession stand, drinking water.
item.name: Kadima Band Outdoor Concert
